messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "gdoc_mob_planning_sessions_agenda",
      "name": "MOB - Planning sessions (Wed 11-26) - Agenda",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-20T12:45:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB - Planning sessions (Wed 11/26) - Agenda
Owner: Alex Smith (PM)
Date: Wednesday, Nov 26, 2025
Timezone: ET

Context
- Project: Mobile App Launch (MOB)
- Goal: Lock in scope, owners, and sequencing ahead of Launch milestone (2025-11-30)
- Inputs: JIRA issues MOB-100 (Initial Setup - Done), MOB-101 (Core Feature - In Progress), latest MOB performance & growth metrics

Session 1 (4:30–5:00pm ET) – Mobile App status & risks (Alex + Jordan)
- Attendees: Alex Smith (PM), Jordan Johnson (Engineer)
- Objective: Walk through current Mobile app implementation and open work, and capture major technical risks.
- Agenda:
  1) Quick status of MOB-101 Core Feature (what’s done, what’s left)
  2) Review any blockers or dependencies (backend services, auth, analytics)
  3) Identify top 3 technical risks and rough impact
  4) Confirm what needs to be ready before Development milestone is fully green
- Notes (to be filled live during meeting):
  - Status summary:
  - Risks identified:
  - Follow-ups / owners:

Session 2 (5:00–5:30pm ET) – Mobile App Launch planning decisions (Alex + Sam + Taylor)
- Attendees: Alex Smith (PM), Sam Williams (Senior Engineer), Taylor Brown (Lead Engineer)
- Objective: Turn the status/risk findings from Session 1 into a concrete plan and sequencing.
- Agenda:
  1) Recap from Session 1 (status + risks) – 5 min
  2) Finalize scope for Planning milestone (what’s in / out)
  3) Clarify ownership across engineering, QA, and infra
  4) Draft sequencing for Development and Launch milestones
  5) Identify any cross-team dependencies that need separate meetings
- Notes (to be filled live during meeting):
  - Scope decisions:
  - Owners / DRIs:
  - Milestone adjustments:

References
- JIRA: MOB-100 - Mobile App Launch - Initial Setup (Status: Done)
- JIRA: MOB-101 - Mobile App Launch - Core Feature (Status: In Progress)
- Calendar events:
  - "MOB - Mobile App status & risks (Alex + Jordan)" – Wed 11/26, 4:30–5:00pm ET
  - "MOB - Mobile App Launch planning decisions (Sam & Taylor)" – Wed 11/26, 5:00–5:30pm ET

Parking Lot
- Questions or topics that don’t fit into the 30-min blocks
- Potential follow-up working sessions if scope or risk list grows too large."
    },
    {
      "id": "gsheet_mob_planning_milestone_matrix",
      "name": "MOB - Planning & Milestone Matrix",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-20T13:10:00-05:00",
      "content": "Sheet: Overview
- Project: Mobile App Launch (MOB)
- Owner: Alex Smith (PM)
- Purpose: Map Planning, Development, and Launch milestones to concrete work items and decisions coming out of the 11/26 planning sessions.

Columns (Sheet: Milestones_Work)
- Milestone
- Target Date
- JIRA Issue Key
- Summary
- Status
- Owner
- Notes

Sample Rows
1) Milestone: Planning | Target Date: 2025-11-10 | JIRA: MOB-100 | Summary: Mobile App Launch - Initial Setup | Status: Done | Owner: Jordan | Notes: Baseline scaffolding completed prior to formal planning.
2) Milestone: Development | Target Date: 2025-11-20 | JIRA: MOB-101 | Summary: Mobile App Launch - Core Feature | Status: In Progress | Owner: Jordan | Notes: Status + risk review scheduled for 11/26 4:30–5:00pm (see agenda doc).
3) Milestone: Launch | Target Date: 2025-11-30 | JIRA: (TBD) | Summary: Launch readiness items | Status: Not Started | Owner: Sam / Taylor | Notes: To be defined in 11/26 5:00–5:30pm planning decisions meeting.

Sheet: Sessions_Linkage
- Session 1 (Status & Risks, Alex + Jordan)
  - Input issues: MOB-101, tech debt backlog
  - Output: risk list, confidence level for Development milestone
- Session 2 (Planning Decisions, Alex + Sam + Taylor)
  - Input: outputs from Session 1, milestone dates
  - Output: updated milestone matrix (this sheet), owners, and follow-up tasks.

Notes
- After 11/26, Alex to update this sheet with final scope and ownership decisions and attach it to both calendar events for reference."
    },
    {
      "id": "gdoc_mob_weekly_report_2025w47",
      "name": "MOB - Weekly Report (Week of Nov 17, 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T16:20:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB - Weekly Report (Week of Nov 17, 2025)
Author: Alex Smith (PM)
Week covered: 2025-11-17 to 2025-11-21

1. Overview
This week we saw solid improvements in both app performance and user engagement for the Mobile App Launch (MOB). No new high-severity incidents were reported, and we remain on track for upcoming planning and launch activities.

2. Key Wins
- Performance: ~15% improvement in median app startup time vs. the previous 4-week baseline.
- Growth: ~10% week-over-week increase in weekly active users (WAU).
- Stability: No new Sev-1 or Sev-2 incidents; error rates remain within target thresholds.

3. Performance Improvements (15% faster startup)
- Source: Internal dashboards (see "MOB - Performance & Growth snapshot (Week of Nov 17, 2025)" and attached PDF export).
- Metric: Median app startup time (50th percentile) across iOS and Android.
- Baseline: ~2300 ms (previous 4 weeks average).
- Current: ~1955 ms (week of Nov 17).
- Change: ~15% improvement.
- Primary drivers:
  - Image loading optimizations shipped early in the week.
  - Caching tweaks that reduced redundant network calls on app start.

4. User Growth (10% WAU increase)
- Metric: Weekly active users (WAU) across all regions.
- Baseline: ~50,000 WAU.
- Current: ~55,000 WAU.
- Change: ~10% uplift week-over-week.
- Notes:
  - Early data suggests the new onboarding flow is contributing to higher activation rates, especially on Android.
  - We will continue to monitor retention cohorts over the next 2–3 weeks.

5. Risks & Next Steps
- Risks:
  - Some open technical risks remain on MOB-101 (Core Feature) that could affect Development and Launch milestones.
  - We still need to fully align on scope and sequencing for the remaining work.
- Next Steps:
  - Conduct two back-to-back planning meetings on Wed 11/26:
    1) "MOB - Mobile App status & risks (Alex + Jordan)" (4:30–5:00pm ET)
    2) "MOB - Mobile App Launch planning decisions (Sam & Taylor)" (5:00–5:30pm ET)
  - Use outputs from those sessions to finalize scope and ownership in the "MOB - Planning & Milestone Matrix" sheet.

6. References
- Dashboard: "MOB - Performance & Growth snapshot (Week of Nov 17, 2025)"
- Attachment (email export): MOB_weekly_snapshot_2025-11-21.pdf
- JIRA: MOB-100 (Initial Setup, Done), MOB-101 (Core Feature, In Progress).
- Upcoming planning sessions agenda: "MOB - Planning sessions (Wed 11/26) - Agenda"."
    },
    {
      "id": "gslide_mob_weekly_highlights_deck",
      "name": "MOB - Weekly Highlights - Nov 17, 2025",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T16:30:00-05:00",
      "content": "Slide 1 – Title
- Title: Mobile App Launch (MOB) - Weekly Highlights
- Subtitle: Week of Nov 17, 2025
- Owner: Alex Smith (PM)

Slide 2 – Summary
- 15% faster median app startup time vs. previous 4-week baseline.
- 10% week-over-week growth in weekly active users (WAU).
- No new high-severity incidents.

Slide 3 – Performance
- Source: Internal dashboards ("MOB - Performance & Growth snapshot (Week of Nov 17, 2025)").
- Metric: Median app startup time (50th percentile, iOS + Android).
- Baseline: 2300 ms → Current: 1955 ms (~15% improvement).
- Notes: Driven by image loading and caching optimizations.

Slide 4 – User Growth
- Metric: Weekly active users (WAU).
- Baseline: 50,000 → Current: 55,000 (~10% uplift).
- Notes: New onboarding flow appears to be boosting activation, especially on Android.

Slide 5 – Looking Ahead
- Maintain performance gains as we add remaining MOB-101 functionality.
- Use 11/26 planning sessions to lock scope and ownership for Development and Launch.
- Reference docs:
  - "MOB - Weekly Report (Week of Nov 17, 2025)" (narrative details)
  - "MOB - Planning sessions (Wed 11/26) - Agenda" (meeting structure)
  - "MOB - Planning & Milestone Matrix" (work mapping to milestones)."
    },
    {
      "id": "pdf_mob_weekly_snapshot_2025_11_21",
      "name": "MOB_weekly_snapshot_2025-11-21.pdf",
      "mimeType": "application/pdf",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T15:05:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB - Performance & Growth snapshot (Week of Nov 17, 2025)
Generated: 2025-11-21 15:02 ET
Owner: Alex Smith

Key Metrics
1) Median App Startup Time (ms)
- Baseline (previous 4 weeks): 2300 ms
- Current (week of Nov 17): 1955 ms
- Change: ~15% improvement
- Notes: 50th percentile across iOS and Android.

2) Weekly Active Users (WAU)
- Baseline (previous 4 weeks): 50,000
- Current (week of Nov 17): 55,000
- Change: ~10% growth
- Notes: Authenticated users across all regions.

Summary
- Performance has improved significantly following image loading and caching optimizations.
- User growth is trending positively, likely tied to the new onboarding flow.

This PDF was exported from the internal dashboard and is attached to the "MOB - Weekly highlights (week of Nov 17)" email for leadership review."
    },
    {
      "id": "gdoc_mob_leadership_sync_notes_2025_11_24",
      "name": "MOB - Leadership Sync Notes - 2025-11-24",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T11:15:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch (MOB) - Leadership Sync Notes
Date: Monday, Nov 24, 2025
Participants: Taylor (Lead Engineer), Alex (PM), Sam (Senior Engineer)

1. Weekly Highlights Recap
- Alex summarized the key wins from "MOB - Weekly Report (Week of Nov 17, 2025)":
  - ~15% improvement in median app startup time.
  - ~10% increase in WAU.
  - No new high-severity incidents.
- Leadership reviewed the attached dashboard PDF (MOB_weekly_snapshot_2025-11-21.pdf).

2. Upcoming Planning Sessions (Wed 11/26)
- Confirmed structure based on "MOB - Planning sessions (Wed 11/26) - Agenda":
  1) 4:30–5:00pm ET: Alex + Jordan, focus on status and risks for MOB-101.
  2) 5:00–5:30pm ET: Alex + Sam + Taylor, focus on planning decisions and milestones.
- Taylor emphasized the need to keep both sessions tightly time-boxed.

3. Deliverables from 11/26
- Update "MOB - Planning & Milestone Matrix" with finalized scope and ownership.
- Capture key decisions and follow-ups directly in the agenda doc and link those notes from JIRA tickets (especially MOB-101).

4. Action Items
- Alex: Ensure both calendar events on 11/26 include links to:
  - Agenda doc
  - Milestone matrix
  - Latest weekly report.
- Sam: Prepare any open questions about sequencing and resource constraints for the second session.

5. Notes
- Leadership is comfortable highlighting the performance and growth improvements in upcoming org-wide updates, provided we maintain current trend lines through Launch."
    }
  ]
}
